charges.charge_description: 36 CFR 4.23(a)(1) [TE41 3428373] - Operating a motor vehicle under the influence of alcohol to a degree that renders the operator incapable of safe operation.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed upon motion of the government

charges.charge_description: 36 CFR 4.23(a)(2) [TE41 3428374] - Operating a motor vehicle with an alcohol concentration of 0.08 grams or greater.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: a total term of imprisonment of 48 hours (credit t/s); a fine of $350.00, a processing fee of $25.00, a special assessment fee of $10.00
dismissed upon motion of the government

charges.charge_description: 36 CFR 4.14 [TE41 3428376] - Open container of alcoholic beverage in motor vehicle.(4)

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed upon motion of the government
